strapiPost.title: Full Steam Ahead
strapiPost.content:
The Goddard School footprint in Northwest Arkansas is getting bigger. The third location in the NWA franchise is opening in Bentonville this fall. 

  • Locally owned: The owners of the Bentonville Goddard School are John Brown alums with a desire to provide support for parents and a “premier preschool experience for children that reflects the Bentonville and Arkansas community.”
  • Programs: The school uses a learning program called F.L.EX., which stands for Fun Learning Experience. And it implements STEAM, a program which targets fast growing industries in the US like science, technology, engineering, art and math.
